definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
erhua variant of 單個|单个[dan1 ge5]

sentences.english: Rhizomes consistently short necked, culms always forming a single clump.
sentences.chinese: 一貫的根狀莖短頸，稈總是形成一片單個的叢。

sentences.english: Never waste too much time on some new words and single sentences.
sentences.chinese: 不要在單個詞或單句上浪費太多時間。

sentences.english: Customized multi-character marking on one single sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 在單個套管上根據客戶要求定製多字符數碼。

sentences.english: A non-shared cache is accessible by a single user only.
sentences.chinese: 非共享緩存只由單個用戶訪問。

sentences.english: Imagine, for the sake of argument, that it is necessary to lock individual dice.
sentences.chinese: 爲了討論的方便，假設有必要鎖定單個的骰子。

sentences.english: The World Bank is the largest single international funding source for biodiversity projects.
sentences.chinese: 世界銀行是生物多樣性項目的最大單個國際資金來源。

sentences.english: Chelsea's win gives them a goal tally of 103 for the season - a Premier League record.
sentences.chinese: 切爾西單個賽季共進103個球，成爲了英超新記錄。

sentences.english: Chioce of single or multiple installation.
sentences.chinese: 燈具可單個或多個組合安裝。

sentences.english: A single filter bag dust collector and tank wall friction damage.
sentences.chinese: 單個有過濾袋和除塵器箱壁磨擦破損的。

sentences.english: All right, so we can, in fact, observe individual lines.
sentences.chinese: 好的，事實上我們可以看單個的譜線。

sentences.english: Your individual hotel costs may be lower or higher based on the favorability of your margins.
sentences.chinese: 你的單個酒店成本可能會根據毛利率高低而浮動。

sentences.english: Elements on your page do not have to be confined to individual grid units. In a five-column grid, 5 narrow columns of text can be hard to read.
sentences.chinese: 你無須強制你頁面上的元素都限制於單個單元格。

sentences.english: The single word gloss was usually interlined.
sentences.chinese: 對單個詞的註釋還常用間注法。

sentences.english: Build element definitions as necessary to reference a single complex type definition.
sentences.chinese: 根據需要構建元素定義，以引用單個複雜類型定義。

sentences.english: The value-chain concept has been extended beyond individual organizations.
sentences.chinese: 價值鏈的概念已經跨越了單個企業。

sentences.english: Allows multiple control bars to be floated in a single mini-frame window.
sentences.chinese: 允許多個控制條浮動在單個小框架窗口中。

definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
